Description.Text:
Position Hotel Shardana is located in Baia Santa Reparata, 3 km far from Santa Teresa and 1 km from Capo Testa.
Restaurant The restaurant serves buffet breakfast and lunch, as well as an à-la-carte dinner with a salad and appetizer buffet.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Other facilities: Front desk 24/7, Safe at Front Desk, Bar, billiard room, tv room, piano bar, swimming pool with parasols and chairs, free parking (unguarded).
OTHER INFORMATION: Cot for children up to 1 year old, free and AVAILABLE ONLY FOR DOUBLE ROOM.
